headline: 3 Big Reasons to Love DexCom (DXCM)
summary: Over the past six months, DexCom has been a great trade. While the S&P 500 was flat, the stock price has climbed by 15.6% to $87 per share. This was partly thanks to its solid quarterly results, and the run-up might have investors contemplating their next move.
